sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you see some <radical>dry</radical> <radical>flowers</radical>, pull them up and you'll find a <kanji>potato</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Potatoes grow when flowers dry out. All the nutrients are going to the potato under the ground, so the flowers up top get sucked dry.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Potato</kanji>es are totally <reading>emo</reading> (<ja>いも</ja>) because of the way they dry out flowers. Emo people and potatoes both like to dry out flowers.
readingInfo: Picture an emo potato sitting alone in a dark room, staring at a potato. "You and I are the same."
